metrics_conclusion: Music of the Night has higher complexity than the average song  in terms Chord Complexity and Chord Progression Novelty.
key_conclusion: Music of the Night has sections analyzed in the following keys: D♭ Major, B Major, G♯ Minor, A♭ Major,  and F Minor.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
